titleStmt.title: Charisma patrikon, a paternal gift, or, The legacie of a dying father, to his living children wherein there is a tast of the childs duty of heart-keeping to be hard keeping, of the sufficiency of grace, and of sin, the folly of sinners / by Ri. Mayhew ...
titleStmt.author: Mayhew, R. (Richard)
